scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run transpile && npm run aggregate
scripts.build.min: npm run clean && npm run transpile && npm run aggregate.min
scripts.build.release: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run validate && npm run test.coverage && npm run build.min && npm run test.integration
scripts.build.all: npm run build.release && npm run docs
scripts.clean: npm run clean.dist && npm run clean.coverage && npm run clean.tarball
scripts.aggregate: npm run aggregate.dts && npm run aggregate.js && npm run aggregate.clean
scripts.aggregate.min: npm run aggregate.dts && npm run aggregate.js && npm run aggregate.js.min && npm run aggregate.clean
scripts.release.patch: npm version patch && npm run orchestrate.release
scripts.release.minor: npm version minor && npm run orchestrate.release
scripts.release.major: npm version major && npm run orchestrate.release
scripts.orchestrate.release: npm run build.release && npm pack && npm run publish.release
scripts.publish.release: git push --follow-tags origin master && npm publish
